channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Man who represented himself is found guilty of trying to assassinate Trump at Florida golf course
item.description: Ryan Routh has been found guilty of attempting to assassinate Donald Trump at a Florida golf course last year.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel is set to return to his late-night show after ABC lifts suspension
Girl shot in the head in Minneapolis church attack is making ‘miraculous’ progress, family says
